title: ScrollSort
seoIntro: ScrollSort is a pattern-based browser puzzle game where quick reading and clean decisions matter.
seoDetails: Each run challenges you to scan, sort, and react with precision. If you like logic games that reward focus and speed, ScrollSort delivers short sessions with real replay value.
seoHowToPlay: Start each round by identifying the rule in play, then sort items efficiently while avoiding slow or unnecessary moves.
seoFeatures: Fast puzzle rounds built for browser play
Skill-based progression through better decision making
Great fit for quick breaks and repeat attempts

faq.question: Is ScrollSort free to play?

faq.answer: ScrollSort is designed for modern web browsers on desktop and mobile devices.
